apps.author: WSTxda
apps.name: MicroG
apps.changeLog:
- Bump GMS version to 24.02.55
- **Revert changes that cause cloud messaging to work with delay**
- Fixed the bug in the signature spoofing module. Binder.getCallingUid() should be used for permission judgment
- Fixed <real-time weather> & «Meteoroloji> app map layer display issues

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/WSTxda/MicroG-RE/compare/4.6...4.7

apps.author: breezy-weather
apps.name: Breezy Weather
apps.changeLog:
**Weather sources**
- [AccuWeather] Fix snow quantity being 10 times lower
- [AccuWeather] Request texts in Imperial units if precipitation unit in app is configured as inch
- [Météo-France] Fix normals (missing in January, shifted by one month on other months)

**Other improvements and fixes**
- Fix incorrect degree day in Fahrenheit
- Show 2 decimals instead of 1 when precipitation unit is inch
- Fix air quality index being always shown as 250 when index > 250

**Translations**
- Initial translation added for Hindi (thanks Chandra Mohan Jha!)
- Translations updated

*Releases distributed on GitHub do not include proprietary Network Location Providers*

---

apps.author: beemdevelopment
apps.name: Aegis
apps.changeLog:
## New features

* An optional 'name' field for icon packs to bypass filename character restrictions

## Fixed bugs

* The Authenticator Pro importer only supported the legacy backup format
* A crash could occur in the tile service

apps.author: ImranR98
apps.name: Obtainium
apps.changeLog:
## What's Changed
* Update it.json by @unbranched in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1351
* Update hu.json by @gidano in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1350
* Better support for SourceForge (#1352), Remove READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE again (#1309) + fix typo by @ImranR98 in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1356
* Update pt translation by @jont4 in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1357
* Translation of the Note of the sources window by @DwainZwerg in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1361
* Correctly report and auto-delete bad APKs (#1251) by @ImranR98 in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1363
* Add DeepL translations as placeholders by @ImranR98 in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1364
* Update de.json by @heuwerk in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1365

## New Contributors
* @heuwerk made their first contribution in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1365

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/compare/v1.0.1...v1.0.2

apps.changeLog:
Release v2024.02.11-1148

# ReVanced Patches


 Published on Thu Feb  8 19:18:12 UTC 2024

# [4.2.0](https://github.com/ReVanced/revanced-patches/compare/v4.1.0...v4.2.0) (2024-02-08)


### Bug Fixes

* **Infinity for Reddit - Unlock subscription:** Do not crash by patching billing client ([7d76e2e](https://github.com/ReVanced/revanced-patches/commit/7d76e2e43c69b2b75f40a15a9147d041c77cbcd9))


### Features

* **X:** Add `Hide view count` patch ([bf064ec](https://github.com/ReVanced/revanced-patches/commit/bf064ecc1d5de8b592d14d34acfa1a4314c374ba))
* **X:** Add `Unlock downloads` patch ([2c20844](https://github.com/ReVanced/revanced-patches/commit/2c20844eaae698f185a9d321e2c70bde4b485cee))





---

# ReX Patches


 Published on Sun Feb 11 06:41:36 UTC 2024

# YouTube
- **feat(Hook Download Button)**: Hook download button for Flyout Menu https://github.com/YT-Advanced/ReX-patches/issues/70
https://www.reddit.com/r/revancedextended/comments/1anbgjo/hook_download_button_option/
- **fix(Hide channel avatar section)**: Not worked due to A/B Testing https://github.com/YT-Advanced/ReX-patches/issues/54
- **fix(Hide Quick Action Component)**: `Hide comment button` not working https://github.com/YT-Advanced/RVX_BUG_CENTER/issues/14
- **fix(Hide Layout Component)**: `Hide community posts in home feed` no longer working https://github.com/YT-Advanced/ReX-patches/issues/53
- **fix(YouTube - Litho Filter)**: Ignore null buffers

# YouTube Music
- **fix(Hide action bar component)**: Hide Like/Dislike button not worked in v6.35+ https://github.com/YT-Advanced/ReX-patches/issues/57
- **fix(Spoof App Version)**: Change target version `6.10.53` to `6.11.52` https://github.com/YT-Advanced/ReX-patches/issues/67

---


Use [MicroG](https://github.com/inotia00/VancedMicroG/releases) for YouTube and Music
